TopicTitle: Some multiplayer ideas from us Kerbal Redditors

Articles.Content:
http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/y4j8u/suggestion_when_multiplayer_is_implemented/

Here is the thread. Basically, it involves a huge multiplayer change. Things like factions, International space stations, private bases, stock parts that include weaponry, and all around crazy. Right now, KSP mimics current space programs, basic orbits and satellites, as well as some interplanetary (in the next update) travel. But I think when we look at Earth's space program, we can see space fighting in the next few centuries. So, why not include that into the KSP game. It would be a huge boost to the game, making this not only the best space simulator game, but also the best space fighting game. I am tired so excuse my bad grammar/spelling/stupidity.

Anyway, I hope Squad looks at this and puts it in mind. I don't expect anything in the next couple updates, but I think this would be an awesome thing to look into implementing. This game has so much potential, and is already addictive as hell in Alpha. Again, this gives us a new objective: Build, conquer, fight. Not just travel.

Thank you so very much if you put the time into reading this ******** of a text paste thing. Smagmuck, if you think you can make this sound better, tell me, because now i realize I shouldn't have done this. So sorry.

-Convert to Metal (Benova)

Multiplayer has been discussed to death and bringing the topic up around here is like beating a dead horse.

Suffice to say there are no current plans to add multiplayer but it's not off the table completely. The single player game will be done and complete before Squad even looks at the concept simply due to the difficulties of issues like warping. Space simulation can take long periods of time requiring some form of time acceleration that just doesn't translate well to multiplayer.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
